Comments.Name: Chris Madden
Comments.Message: If you use the proper knife for the job and it is sharp you don't need this dubious hack.

Replies.Robin Henneberry: Chris Madden, you mean you're not supposed to cut this with a butter knife???
Replies.Elizabeth: And btw this knife can't cut through some rice and seaweed but it can cut through plastic? Come on now

Comments.Name: Craig Seago
Comments.Message: 5 minute crafts that take longer because you use a blunt knife

Replies.Robin Henneberry: Step one. Use a sharp knife.
Replies.Yash: Option number two will use more plastic. Using a sharper knife will be cheaper and less time consuming.
